mapper.insert: insert into t_goods ( after_sale, category_id, commission, commission_type, createtime, updatetime, fx_type, got_score, got_score_type, hidden, kanjia, limitation, kanjia_price, logistics_id, max_coupons, miaosha, min_price, min_score, name, number_fav, number_goodrequtation, number_orders, number_sells, original_price, paixu, pic, pingtuan, pingtuan_price, recommend_status, recommend_statusstr, sell_end, sell_start, shop_id, status, statusstr, store_alert, stores, stores_unsale, admin_id, vet_status, views, weight ) value ( #{afterSale}, #{categoryId}, #{commission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commissionType}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{fxType}, #{gotScore}, #{gotScoreType}, #{hidden}, #{kanjia}, #{limitation}, #{kanjiaPrice}, #{logisticsId}, #{maxCoupons}, #{miaosha}, #{minPrice}, #{minScore}, #{name}, #{numberFav}, #{numberGoodrequtation}, #{numberOrders}, #{numberSells}, #{originalPrice}, #{paixu}, #{pic}, #{pingtuan}, #{pingtuanPrice}, #{recommendStatus}, #{recommendStatusstr}, #{sellEnd}, #{sellStart}, #{shopId}, #{status}, #{statusstr}, #{storeAlert}, #{stores}, #{storesUnsale}, #{adminId}, #{vetStatus}, #{views}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update t_goods r set after_sale=#{afterSale}, category_id=#{categoryId}, commission=#{commission}, commission_type=#{commissionType}, createtime=#{createtime}, updatetime=#{updatetime}, fx_type=#{fxType}, got_score= #{gotScore}, got_score_type= #{gotScoreType}, hidden= #{hidden}, kanjia= #{kanjia}, limitation= #{limitation}, kanjia_price= #{kanjiaPrice}, logistics_id= #{logisticsId}, max_coupons= #{maxCoupons}, miaosha= #{miaosha}, min_price= #{minPrice}, min_score= #{minScore}, name= #{name}, number_fav= #{numberFav}, number_goodrequtation= #{numberGoodrequtation}, number_orders= #{numberOrders}, number_sells= #{numberSells}, original_price= #{originalPrice}, paixu= #{paixu}, pic= #{pic}, pingtuan= #{pingtuan}, pingtuan_price= #{pingtuanPrice}, recommend_status=#{recommendStatus}, recommend_statusstr= #{recommendStatusstr}, sell_end= #{sellEnd}, sell_start= #{sellStart}, shop_id= #{shopId}, status= #{status}, statusstr= #{statusstr}, store_alert= #{storeAlert}, stores= #{stores}, stores_unsale= #{storesUnsale}, admin_id= #{adminId}, vet_status= #{vetStatus}, views= #{views}, weight= #{weight} where id=#{id}
